body.p: Although the strategically selected subset of the Uruk IV/III corpus is only two-thirds of the entire corpus in terms of manuscripts, the graphemic coverage provided by the combination of ACN and PC25 is very high.
Of the 5976 texts in the entire PCSL corpus, contain unencoded signs, i.e., of texts have no unencoded graphemes.

The total number of instances of graphemes that are included in the encoded repertoire is substantial: of instances of graphemes, only instances of graphemes are not encoded. of instances of graphemes in PCSL are represented in the encodings either directly or as sequences.
